column2: "Ah, it's you, it's you! Great timing!"
"Lisa is soooo happy, she could go postal right now! ...That was a joke, by the way."
"By the way, have you been there yet? Y'know, that unexplained corrupted zone. Don't lie to me, now."
"You know, that zone! The zone that's been designated as a restricted area even for ARKS members."
"It's intriguing... Nobody can explain it... Lisa is getting excited just thinking about it!"
"Everyone's worried about [Double], but Lisa thinks this is way more dangerous."
"Hm? How's it more dangerous? Don't ask Lisa. She just assumes it is."
"Planet Harkotan is in a big mess right now ever since [Double] appeared. They caused it."
"So, so, so! The corrupted zone must have a cause too. What do you suppose it is?"
"Darker infestation? A natural disaster? Or something more sinister? No one has a clue."
"Well~ maybe there is someone out there with a clue. Lisa doesn't know."
"Whatever the answer, it's Lisa's paradise! Lots of strong enemies to shoot!"
"Who cares about the small stuff anyway?"
"Just give her plenty of things to kill, and Lisa is perfectly happy! Fufufu, fufufu!"
